name: Here Come the Humans!
description:
At the dawn of the 22nd century, humankind sent an envoy of robotic probes out into the cosmos. Their mission was to prepare the planet Proxima Centauri B for human colonization, in anticipation of the day when the human generation ships would arrive more than a century later. 

That day has finally come. 

With seemingly plenty of time to spare, and with terraforming a planet being such exhausting work. We robots may have procrastinated a tad, so… 

 It’s been a long time, but we’re not done yet!  

We cant let the humans learn that we spent all this time partying instead of working! Get to the landing sites and clear the area before they catch on!

Controls Movement:

Look - Mouse | Gamepad Right Stick
Move - WASD | Gamepad Left Stick 
Rise - Q | Mouse Scroll | Gamepad Face Button Left
Lower - E | Mouse Scroll | Gamepad Face Button Bottom

Action:

Fire Laser - Left Click | Gamepad Bumper Left
Deploy Turret - Right Click | Gamepad Bumper Right

Misc:

Pause - Esc | P | Gamepad Special
Ready - Space | Gamepad Face Button Bottom

Credits

Entry for 2020 Epic MegaJam - https://itch.io/jam/2020-epic-megajam

Assets:

Building Meshes - KitBash3D - https://kitbash3d.com/
SFX - Soundly - https://getsoundly.com/

Music:

Sunday Dub by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4435-sunday-dub
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Made With:

Unreal Engine - https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/
Blender - https://www.blender.org/
Krita - https://krita.org/en/
GIMP - https://www.gimp.org/
Inkscape - https://inkscape.org/
